attributes.additional_details:
Make the government hold a debate on firearms law including bans and the reclassification of illegal firearms and any other legislation that is unfair and must be updated or replaced.

The debate must be debated by the government and the public which must include Firearm certificate holders such as myself and members of shooting associations such as the NRA and the Sportsman Association.

This must be a face to face between the government and the public not behind closed doors, so that our points can be heard
